description.raw:
This is some refactoring of the tile_tsv.py script that I did while merging @{557058:ceb5942c-6843-408c-8550-3ce4899d299b}'s work in pull request #106 into the tile_tsv.py script. I've pulled it here targeting the gazebo9 branch so I can add some artifact features on top of it.

The commit messages describe the changes pretty well:

* tile_tsv.py: support python3

* tile_tsv.py: use python3

* tile_tsv.py: add --world-file argument

* tile_tsv.py: update comms_model xml block

* tile_tsv.py: add print_world_top and print_world_bottom functions to clean up check_main

* tile_tsv.py: print script name with __file__, whitespace

* tile_tsv.py: move contents of print_tsv_model_includes to check_main function
